```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(latex2exp)

results <- read_csv("final_sim_results.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
results$method <- as.factor(results$method)
results$type <- as.factor(results$type)

results <- results %>%
  dplyr::select(-"...1") %>%
  mutate(true_var = case_when(
    n == 500 ~ 9.52, 
    n == 1000 ~ 6.32, 
    n == 10000 ~ 7.48))
```
